entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then north 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:43 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 15. POP 60%
